name: Cosmos (itch) (Equalent)
description:
CURRENTLY INCOMPLETE

A simple space game using C++ and SFML. Made to serve as a sample.

GitHub: https://github.com/equalent/cosmos

Assets used

- Space Shooter (Redux, plus fonts and sounds) by Kenney Vleugels (www.kenney.nl)

- Sci-Fi Sounds (1.0) by Kenney Vleugels (www.kenney.nl)

- space1a.wav by Ville Nousiainen
